description: Beautifully melt in your mouth moments.
name: Passionfruit Melting Moments Recipe | Woolworths

recipeInstructions.text: Preheat oven to 160Â°C. Grease and line 2 baking trays.
Cream first lot of butter, essence and icing sugar until pale in colour.
Sift together the flour and custard powder and stir into the butter mixture in two lots.
With lightly floured hands, roll mixture into small balls and place about 3 cm apart on trays.
Flatten balls slightly with a floured fork.
Bake for about 15 minutes or until biscuits are a pale straw colour. Stand, cool.
Make the buttercream filling. Cream together the remaining butter and icing sugar until pale in colour. Add in the passionfruit pulp.
Sandwich the biscuits together with the butter cream filling. Dust with icing sugar.
